com.xfy.tipviewmanager.tip

类 AdvancedTip

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.xfy.tipviewmanager.tip.NormalTip

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.animation.ValueAnimator.AnimatorUpdateListener, IAdvancedTip, ITip, Touchable

    public class AdvancedTip
extends NormalTip
implements IAdvancedTip
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/7/8. 高级tip 可修改文字显示方式，使用AdvancedTextDrawable实现文字渲染
